webrtc package

webrtc.connections module

class webrtc.connections.ConnectionHandler(channel_layer, room_group_name)

Bases: object

ConnectionHandler class for handling WebRTC connections

Attributes:

_room_group_name (str): The name of the group _channel_layer (consumer.AsyncConsumer): The channel layer instance

Methods:

add_peoples_to_connect: Adds people to connect _send_request: Sends a request to the group

async add_peoples_to_connect(user: CustomUser)

webrtc.consumers module

class webrtc.consumers.WebRtcConsumer

Bases: AsyncWebsocketConsumer

Websocket consumer for WebRTC connection This consumer is responsible for handling WebRTC connections between users.

Attributes:

  • ConnectionHandler (ConnectionHandler): ConnectionHandler instance for handling WebRTC connections

Methods:

  • connect: Connects the user to the Websocket consumer

  • disconnect: Disconnects the user from the Websocket consumer

  • receive: Receives data from the user and sends it to the group

  • event_create: Sends an event to the user

  • massage_to_user: Sends a message to the user

async connect()
async disconnect(close_code)

Called when a WebSocket connection is closed.

async event_create(event)
async massage_to_user(event)
async receive(text_data)

Called with a decoded WebSocket frame.
